attributes.action: Get rid of the planters off Kirkgate otley, stop them killing small businesses.
attributes.additional_details: Many businesses have plead with Otley bid and local town councillors for the removal now covid is over . Not only have pleas been ignored but this has had a knock on effect on the local economy as there is no space for tourists and shoppers to park as these planters are in disabled parking spots as well as standard . Making kirkgate inaccessible. Further more they are a massive eyesore .
attributes.background: Get rid of the planters , local businesses pleas have been ignored . Many shops and local enterprise have been closed down and many more will follow suit if action is not taken . This is now in the national press . These originally was for social distancing now covid is over the planters remain.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about the planters at Kirkgate Otley are a matter for the relevant local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
